description:
In this course titled 'Learn How to Heal Yourself Faster Using Self Hypnosis' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  • How To Heal Faster1) Wouldn't it be great if you knew a method that can help you heal naturally and easily? 2) Imagine how wonderful it will be if you know how to use the power of your mind for healing? 2. How Self Hypnosis Can Help? 1) Self hypnosis helps change your old and limiting beliefs and thoughts 2) Self hypnosis brings more mental alertness 3) Self Hypnosis helps you a great wave of relaxation refreshing your whole body 4) Self hypnosis helps to connect with the deep sources of power and energy within you 5) Self hypnosis helps maintain positive attitude 6) Self hypnosis treats stress, anxiety, nervousness and depression successfully 7) One thing that hypnosis can do is improve the connection between your mind and body. Your mind and your body are always connected to each other â€” the stronger the connection, the better it is for your physical and mental wellness.

This course is for those who want to heal their pain and health faster using powerful self hypnosis techniques to make their mind work faster than before and increase the healing process.

It is also very helpful for people who want to get over depression , anxiety , insomnia , negativity and stress.

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 8 lectures in English including bonuses.

This course contains-

Lecture 1: Introduction

Lecture 2: Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture 3: Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture 4: How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture 5: How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture 6: Guided Visualization Exercise: To Heal Faster

Lecture 7: Summary

Lecture 8: Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity
title: Learn How to Heal Yourself Faster Using Self Hypnosis
